$interpreted: Female Villager: The market is right ahead. Thank you both for bringing me here.
Angelia: You're welcome. We've bothered the village enough. It's only natural we help out.
Naya: Besides, that's quite a lot of stuff you're buying. Having more hands makes light work!
Female Villager: Can't do anything about it; it's three growing kids back home after all... Thank goodness that Hyde was willing to take over Sir Nikola's school.
Female Villager: If not for the school, just taking care of the kids would leave me no time to even buy groceries!
Angelia: Never thought a decorated military advisor would start a village school after his retirement.
Female Villager: No kidding. An ex-kingdom minister willingly came to this remote village; it really scared us back then
Naya: Was Hyde there back then as well?
Female Villager: He's an orphan adopted by Sir Nikola..
Female Villager: Even though he's an orphan, Sir treated him like his own son; even taught Hyde all the knowledge he acquired in his lifetime!
Angelia: No wonder you guys trust him so much.
Female Villager: Of course. Hyde is smart and handsome; on top of it all, he's a gentleman. If not for my three kids, I would've made my move a LONG time ago!
Female Villager: Why are you guys so curious about Hyde though? You've been asking so many questions about him these past few days...
Angelia: Umm, because...
Bandit: Woman, behave and give us your money, or else...
Naya: We're having a proper conversation; so take your troublemaking somewhere else!
Bandit: Damn it. You wait and see. We will have our revenge someday!
Naya: I dare you to come back. I'll always be here to kick your ***!

Female Villager: Thank goodness you girls are here to protect me...
In return, I'll tell you everything about Hyde that I know!
Angelia: Really?
Female Villager: Of course. It's quite obvious that you have a thing for Hyde too. Otherwise, you wouldn't be asking so many questions~
Naya: Haha, well then ma'am. Please lend a helping hand to my little sis here!
Angelia: Then... did Sir Hyde really learn everything Sir Nikola has to offer?
Female Villager: That's right. As a matter of fact, I believe that he is even better than Sir Nikola.
Female Villager: During the last bandit attack, Hyde set up a plan that allowed everyone to escape scot-free. It's like he already knew how everything would play out...
Naya: Angel, are you really going to do this?
Angelia: In terms of ability, Sir Hyde is up there with Minister Nikola. The beast incident a while ago is also a proof of his ability.
Angelia: After observing him for the past few days, I believe that he is someone worthy of our trust.
Big Po: Teacher, we're going home for dinner!
Po: We will do our homework next time!
Hyde: These brats, always run the fastest in times like this...
Hyde: Hmm? Miss Naya and Miss Angel?
Naya: Angel, there's no one around...
Angelia: Sir Hyde, there's something I want to tell you. Please don't be surprised.
Hyde: You mean the fact that you're Angelia Carlos, princess of Kingdom of the Sun?
Hyde: Why are you two the ones acting surprised?
Hyde: This village is remote, doesn't mean we don't know about major events. Also, your glowing hair and the grace you have are difficult to hide from Hyde.
Naya: During our stay in the Slums, no one saw through this disguise for several months. You have quite the keen eye...
Angelia: If that's the case, you must already know about the purpose of my visit, right?
Hyde: You want Master Nikola to come out of retirement to assist you in your war against Theodore, but Master's passing threw a wrench into your plans.
Hyde: So now, you want to ask me to help out Sunshine Infantry, right?
Angelia: Yes, you're right. Then, Sir Hyde, your answer is...
Hyde: I'm sorry, but I refuse.
Angelia: Why !?
Naya: Yeah, aren't you Nikola's disciple?
Naya: Then you should know that Theodore is an absolute villain, and that Angel is the true successor to the throne, shouldn't you?
Hyde: Apologies, but all I want to do is to look over the brats and live a peaceful life. I have no interest in getting involved in political conflicts.
Angelia: Please Sir, please reconsider. I...
Hyde: Ladies, you've been here long enough. Please leave.

Hyde: I will not blow your cover.
In exchange, please spare this village from the flames of war. Thank you.

Model.Text: The market is right ahead. Thank you both for bringing me here.
You're welcome. We've bothered the village enough. It's only natural we help out.
Besides, that's quite a lot of stuff you're buying. Having more hands makes light work!
Can't do anything about it; it's three growing kids back home after all... Thank goodness that Hyde was willing to take over Sir Nikola's school.
If not for the school, just taking care of the kids would leave me no time to even buy groceries!
Never thought a decorated military advisor would start a village school after his retirement.
No kidding. An ex-kingdom minister willingly came to this remote village; it really scared us back then
Was Hyde there back then as well?
He's an orphan adopted by Sir Nikola..
Even though he's an orphan, Sir treated him like his own son; even taught Hyde all the knowledge he acquired in his lifetime!
No wonder you guys trust him so much.
Of course. Hyde is smart and handsome; on top of it all, he's a gentleman. If not for my three kids, I would've made my move a LONG time ago!
Why are you guys so curious about Hyde though? You've been asking so many questions about him these past few days...

We're having a proper conversation; so take your troublemaking somewhere else!
Damn it. You wait and see. We will have our revenge someday!
I dare you to come back. I'll always be here to kick your ***!

Thank goodness you girls are here to protect me...

In terms of ability, Sir Hyde is up there with Minister Nikola. The beast incident a while ago is also a proof of his ability.
After observing him for the past few days, I believe that he is someone worthy of our trust.
Teacher, we're going home for dinner!
We will do our homework next time!
These brats, always run the fastest in times like this...
Hmm? Miss Naya and Miss Angel?
Angel, there's no one around...
Sir Hyde, there's something I want to tell you. Please don't be surprised.
You mean the fact that you're Angelia Carlos, princess of Kingdom of the Sun?

During our stay in the Slums, no one saw through this disguise for several months. You have quite the keen eye...
If that's the case, you must already know about the purpose of my visit, right?
You want Master Nikola to come out of retirement to assist you in your war against Theodore, but Master's passing threw a wrench into your plans.
So now, you want to ask me to help out Sunshine Infantry, right?
Yes, you're right. Then, Sir Hyde, your answer is...
I'm sorry, but I refuse.
Why !?
Yeah, aren't you Nikola's disciple?
Then you should know that Theodore is an absolute villain, and that Angel is the true successor to the throne, shouldn't you?
Apologies, but all I want to do is to look over the brats and live a peaceful life. I have no interest in getting involved in political conflicts.
Please Sir, please reconsider. I...
Ladies, you've been here long enough. Please leave.

I will not blow your cover.
In exchange, please spare this village from the flames of war. Thank you.
